GROSS_INCOME_HELP: Monthly income before taxes and credits
LOCAL_TAX_HELP: Fixed tax of 0.8% of the taxable income
NATIONAL_TAX_HELP: Progressive tax of between 23% and 43% of the taxable income
NET_INCOME_HELP: Monthly income after taxes and credits
REGIONAL_TAX_HELP: Fixed tax of 2.03% of the taxable income
TAX_CREDIT_HELP: Progressive credit on taxable incomes up to 50,000 €
TAX_CREDIT_2_HELP: Additional credit on taxable incomes up to 35,000 €
SOCIAL_TAX_HELP: Fixed tax of 7.19% of the gross income
